metaTitle: The Christmal Elf - Our product range

productsMain.title: Christmas Elf Set
productsMain.description: Your choice of a girl elf, a boy elf wearing shorts or a boy elf wearing a tunic.
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice)
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.

productsMain.title: Christmas Eve Bags
productsMain.description: Christmas Eve bags containing lots of goodies to keep your child occupied on the special night

productsExtra.title: Nice Certificate

productsExtra.title: Elf Finger Puppets

productsExtra.title: Santa's Special Key
productsExtra.description: If you haven't got a chimney you need santa's special key
